Description: Glazed composition shabti with painted detail: a purple lappet-wig, a pink modelled face with purple features, a purple collar, a white body, pink crossed arms in relief with purple bracelets and holding purple hoes, the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-bag outlined in purple, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of purple painted Hieroglyphs, the lower leg section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot and lower leg section missing
